FuncDef: This command configures the low watermark for the weighted average utilization of the shared buffer space in thefrom-subscriberbuffer pool. When a buffer pool is in an overloaded state and the wa-shared buffer utilization for an ISA drops below low watermark value ISAfrom-subscriberbuffer pool leaves the overload state and a is sent to indicate the overload state has cleared.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the weighted average shared buffer utilization low watermark. Values-0 to 99.
